locations.name: Maasai Mara National Reserve
locations.description: Kenya's premier wildlife reserve, renowned for its abundant wildlife, dramatic landscapes, and the seasonal Great Migration river crossings.

locations.name: Serengeti National Park
locations.description: Tanzania's vast national park, synonymous with the classic African safari, featuring endless plains and massive herds of wildlife.

locations.name: Ngorongoro Conservation Area
locations.description: Area encompassing the Ngorongoro Crater, a UNESCO World Heritage site known as 'Africa's Eden' due to its high concentration of wildlife within the caldera.
